column5: Apply nowThe Master in Finance expands your knowledge in the areas of accounting, taxation, financial law, controlling and financial rating and trains you to become an expert in financial management. The program will sensitize you to current finance-related topics, enabling you to develop a comprehensive understanding of the interrelations between markets.The intensive exchange with lecturers with hands-on experience in the field of finance accompanies you during your entire master's program and prepares you optimally for a successful finance career after your graduation of the Finance master.
